title: The Drug bug
creator_credit: Horla Stefanesco, Animafilm and World Health Organisation
brief_description: An animated film on drug dependence, based on a La Fontaine fable. It shows how “speed” or amphetamines can begin by helping and end by hurting. The story revolves around the fate of a frog who must perform feats of daring to impress his girlfriend.
